snippet: A halal butcher in East Los Angeles expected patronage by fellow Muslims. Latino immigrants became its customers instead, making for some admirable cultural interaction.
abstract: Al Salam Polleria, a family-owned halal poultry butcher in Los Angeles, was initially opened to serve Muslims in the community, but its patrons have turned out to largely be Latino immigrants.
lead_paragraph: A halal butcher in East Los Angeles expected patronage by fellow Muslims. Latino immigrants became its customers instead, making for some admirable cultural interaction.

headline.seo: In East Los Angeles, the Butchers Are Muslim and the Customers Latino
headline.main: Islamic Poultry for Latino Tables (Yes, They Have Chilies, Too)
headline.print_headline: Islamic Poultry for Latino Tables (Yes, They Have Chilies, Too)
